review: Awesome. I've now made my ten year old Bravia a Smart TV. Picture is still amazing so no need to upgrade. Saved several thousands from just this stick.Picture quality is excellent although my model is only 720p. Lots of quality apps to enhance viewing entertainment. Highly recommended.
author: GARRIGA

review: love the entertainment I can get
author: Lynn Caraway

review: your ad states 20,000 free  tv and movies on Prime. Well where are they? Most offerings are at a cost and not a reasonable one at that. Netflix is a far better deal. what you offer on prime at no cost are ancient films available on many cable channels. the stick works nice, what you offer up on prime leaves a lot to be desired. having purchased 3 sticks I am very disappointed.RonM
author: Ronald F. Morasse

review: Worked out very nice, would get one more if it was $19 again.
author: Groovy

review: Great easy to use, setup, and operate
author: Amazon Customer

review: This device is slammed packed full of viewing, playing and listening options. This is an excellent value and if they continue to get more channels that we regularly see on cable, good-bye Comcast. It's as close to a-la-carte TV as you can get so far.
author: Cbraun
